title: Good Vibes/Bad Vibes + Preseason Takeaways, Conk Conk! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 8/30
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with another new episode to get you ready to dominate this season! On today’s fantasy football podcast, get fantasy football takeaways from Week 3 of preseason! Find out which players and teams Andy, Mike, and Jason are most worried about as we turn the page and enter the regular season. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for August 30th, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (06:50) - NFL News
 (18:50) - Good Vibes / Bad Vibes (Preseason)
 (19:40) - Baltimore Ravens
 (22:50) - Bills Backfield
 (28:40) - Detroit Lions / D’Andre Swift
 (31:35) - Bills Passing Attack
 (34:45) - 49ers Backfield
 (38:25) - Damien Harris & Mac Jones
 (46:30) - Mailbag
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Join THE largest fantasy football league! Megalabowl.com
